faqs.question: What documentation is crucial before purchasing a residential plot in Sector 4
faqs.answer: The most critical documents include the Sale Deed or Conveyance Deed confirming ownership, the Mutation Record (Intkal) showing transfer in government records, and the Non-Encumbrance Certificate (EC) which proves the property is free from legal liabilities for the last 15-30 years. Additionally, we verify the approved layout plan from HUDA/Haryana government bodies and check for any outstanding utility bills or tax dues linked to the plot number.

faqs.question: How do I verify the authenticity of a property listing provided by an agent in Sector 4
faqs.answer: A trustworthy real estate agent will always provide verifiable documents and allow physical site visits. The authenticity check involves comparing the ownership documents with government revenue records at the local Tehsildar office and conducting a physical verification of the plot boundaries against the layout map. Our Real Estate Agents in Sector 4 utilize proprietary internal checking systems before listing any property, ensuring all titles are clear and genuine before presenting them to you.
